phases.name: Implementation
phases.description: Update middleware to redirect OAuth success to /projects

subtasks.description: Update OAuth success handler in middleware.ts to redirect to /projects instead of allowing through to /

verification.run: Login via OAuth and verify landing on /projects page

subtasks.notes: Updated OAuth success handler to redirect to /projects?oauth=success instead of allowing through to /?oauth=success. The oauth=success parameter is preserved for any client-side handling needs.

issues_found.description: Minor only - spec inconsistency (documentation issue, not code), optional test coverage improvement
